com.example.y.bookborrow_lendv2

Class user

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.y.bookborrow_lendv2.user
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    borrower, lender, NormalUser

    public abstract class user
extends java.lang.Object
    lender object abstract class contain all user related attributes setter and getter for the book info. And firebase related methods include: setToFirebase , deleteFromFirebase

    Created on 2/15/19.

    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    borrower, lender
